mapper.select: SELECT e.estimate_id AS estimateId, e.req_comp_id AS reqCompId, e.res_comp_id AS resCompId, e.product_id AS productId, e.estimate_qtty AS estimateQtty, e.req_cost AS reqCost, e.offer_cost AS offerCost, e.status, e.created_at AS createdAt, e.updated_at AS updatedAt, p.product_name AS productName, u.company_name AS resCompanyName FROM estimates e JOIN products p ON e.product_id = p.product_id JOIN users u ON e.res_comp_id = u.user_id WHERE e.req_comp_id = #{companyId} ORDER BY e.created_at DESC

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO estimates ( req_comp_id, res_comp_id, product_id, estimate_qtty, req_cost, status, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{reqCompId}, #{resCompId}, #{productId}, #{estimateQtty}, #{reqCost}, 0, -- 상태는 요청중(0)으로 고정 NOW(), NOW() )
